Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class JsonToDevCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.JsonToDevCard
public class JsonToDevCard
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used to read from a Json file all the information about development cards and generates a new set of DevelopmentCards.

  • Method Details

    • readJsonDevelopmentCard

      public java.util.List<DevelopmentCard> readJsonDevelopmentCard​(java.io.InputStreamReader in) throws java.io.IOException, java.util.NoSuchElementException, InvalidReadException
      This method will convert all the data inside the specified file in a List of development Cards. The Json file to be read has to respect the following standards: 0- in order to make this class behave correctly, cards should be ordered by ID. 1- all the cards must be in the same Json file. 2- all the cards must contain the following case sensitive keys: "VictoryPoints", "Level", "ResourceCost", "ResourceIn", "BenefitOut" (keys order has no importance). 3- VictoryPoints has to be a non negative integer value. 4- Level has to be an integer between 1 and 3. 5- ResourceCost and ResourceIn are Maps which can not contain keys different from the following case sensitive keys: "STONE", "COIN", "SHIELD", "SERVANT"(order does not matter). Non negative values are the only values accepted for these keys. If a key misses it is assumed that its value is 0. 6- BenefitOut is a Map which can not contain keys different from the following case sensitive keys: "STONE", "COIN", "SHIELD", "SERVANT", "FAITH"(order does not matter). Non negative values are the only values accepted for these keys. If a key misses it is assumed that its value is 0.
      Parameters:
      in - is a specified FileInputStream used to open Json file with development cards information.
      Returns:
      a list of DevelopmentCard with all the cards read from the file. The list contains the development cards ordered by ID.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if a general error occurred opening/reading/closing the specified file.
      java.util.NoSuchElementException - if an element read is anomalous.
      InvalidReadException - if a card misses some data.

    • readDevelopmentCardArray

      private java.util.List<DevelopmentCard> readDevelopmentCardArray​(com.google.gson.stream.JsonReader reader) throws java.io.IOException, java.util.NoSuchElementException, InvalidReadException
      This method is used to read the entire file pointed by the specified JsonReader.
      Parameters:
      reader - specified pointer to a JsonFile from which development cards information will be taken.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Development cards read by 'reader'.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if a general error occurred reading the specified file.
      java.util.NoSuchElementException - if an element read is anomalous.
      InvalidReadException - if a card misses some data.

    • readDevelopmentCard

      private DevelopmentCard readDevelopmentCard​(com.google.gson.stream.JsonReader reader) throws java.io.IOException, java.util.NoSuchElementException, InvalidReadException
      This method reads the first development card following the reader passed as parameter.
      Parameters:
      reader - Json reader which points to a specific development card inside a Json file.
      Returns:
      a development card with all the features described in the file read by reader.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if a general error occurred reading the specified file.
      java.util.NoSuchElementException - if an element read is anomalous.
      InvalidReadException - if a card misses some data.

    • readResources

      private java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> readResources​(com.google.gson.stream.JsonReader reader) throws java.io.IOException
      This method is used to read a Map which keys are Resources and values are integers.
      Parameters:
      reader - Json reader which points to a Map which keys are Resource, whereas values are Integer>.
      Returns:
      the Map read by 'reader'.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if a general error occurred reading the specified file.

      private java.util.Map<Benefit,​java.lang.Integer> readBenefits​(com.google.gson.stream.JsonReader reader) throws java.io.IOException
      This method is used to read a Map which keys are Benefits and values are integers.

      Returns:
      the Map read by 'reader'.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if a general error occurred reading the specified file.
